scripts.generate-wc: cp src/WebComponents.js src/index.js && GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false react-scripts build src/WebComponents.js
scripts.package-wc: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cat build/static/js/runtime~main.*.js > dist/react-contact-list.js && cat build/static/js/*.chunk.js >> dist/react-contact-list.js && cp build/static/css/main.*.css dist/react-contact-list.css
scripts.build-wc: npm run generate-wc && npm run package-wc
